sentences.cn: 在你打发我们走以前再请仔细考虑一下吧.

sentences.en: Bethink yourself of what you are.
He should bethink himself of his duty.
Neither she nor I could bethink that this haphazard collision will lead to another relationship.
sentences.cn: 我跟她都想不到,一次偶然的碰撞,其实是另一段感情的开始.

sentences.en: The piece of light music __ let _ me _ bethink ( think ) _ the happy hours we spent together.
sentences.cn: 那首轻音乐使我想起我们一起度过的幸福时光.

sentences.en: We should bethink ourselves of the necessity to raise more funds.
sentences.cn: 我们必须考虑到筹集更多基金的必要性.

sentences.en: You are clever, why you bethink of asking me to accompany you?
sentences.cn: 乖, 怎么今天想到要我陪了?

sentences.en: You should bethink yourself of your duty, my lord!
sentences.cn: 大人, 你应该想一想你的职责!

words.tran_cn: 想起，忆起；使……思考；使……考虑

trans.tran_cn: 想起，忆起；使……思考；使……考虑
trans.tran_en: to cause (oneself) to consider or meditate

trans.tran_cn: 考虑，开始想，（被）想起，提醒
